title: Fully gated community, Evening courtesy patrol, Onsite fitness center
neighborhood: 17171 West Roscoe Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: ['Located in Northridge, CA, Village Pointe is an apartment community with a laid-back, resort-style atmosphere that blends Mediterranean architecture with 6 acres of tropical garden paths and courtyards.', "With a dedicated onsite management team that treats the residents like family, Village Pointe is not just your home, it's your community.", '- Beautiful green courtyards with 6 acres of lush, tropical landscaping', '- Large year-round resort-style heated pool', '- Public transportation available', '- Built-in shelving', '- DSL/high-speed internet/cable available', '- Mirrored wardrobe', '- Clubhouse with kitchen, lounge, library, and free Wi-Fi', '- Conveniently near the 405, 101, and 118 Freeways', '- Vaulted ceilings', '- Walk-in closets', '- Onsite fitness center', '- Ceiling fan', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing is subject to change.', 'Call for details.']
